revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (2), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (2)

|upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B07D4KT1GQ |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|Allwinner|Amlogic|List of Single-board computers}} "Libre Computer Board" and "ALL-H3-CC-V1.0-A"'' is silkscreened :on the board near the 40-pin GPIO connector. ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Allwinner]] H3 @1.0GHz Quad-Core (ARM Cortex-A7) *GPU: ''Mali-400MP2'' (OpenGL ES 2.0, OpenVG 1.1) *Memory: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM (''SK hynix'') *Onboard Storage: eMMC 4.1 module, :TF card (max. 64GB) / MMC card *Ports: 1x FE LAN, 4x USB 2.0 ports ==Links of Interest== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Libre_Computer_Project#ALL-H3-CC_(Tritium) ''Libre Computer ALL-H3-CC (Tritium)'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://linux-sunxi.org/Libre_Computer_Board_ALL-H3-CC ''Libre Computer ALL-H3-CC Series Boards'' on '''SunXi'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/11/15/9-libre-computer-tritium-allwinner-h2h3h5-sbcs-leverage-raspberry-pi-3-form-factor-crowdfunding/ ''Libre Computer Tritium Allwinner H2+/H3/H5 SBCs'' on '''CNX|Software'''] ==See also== *[[Libre Computer La Frite (1GB)]] (AML-S805X-AC) • 1/2GB • [[Amlogic]] S805X *[[Libre Computer Le Potato]] (2GB) (AML-S905X-CC) • 2GB, 64-bit, 4K Media *[[Libre Computer Renegade (1GB)]] (ROC-RK3328-CC) • 1/2/4GB, GbE, USB 3.0 *[[Libre Computer Tritium H5]] (ALL-H3-CC H5) • 2GB • [https://libre.computer/products/boards/all-h3-cc/ PPage] *[[Libre Computer Tritium H3]] (ALL-H3-CC H3) • 1GB • [https://libre.computer/products/boards/all-h3-cc/ PPage] *[[Libre Computer Tritium IoT]] (ALL-H3-CC H2+) • 512MB •
